item.title: "Text as Spiritual Imagery"
item.description: [ ](http://www.ozeukes.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/09/text-as-spiritual-image.jpg)McGlade Gallery - “Text as Spiritual Imagery” To be opened by: The Hon. Virginia Judge M.P. B.Ed. Member for Strathfield Minister for the Arts and Minister for Fair Trading The Artists: * Haji Noor Deen * Leonid Denysenko * Jeannette Siebols * Liang Xiao Ping * Megan McDonald * Phaptawan Suwannakudt * Elaine Witton Australian Catholic University, Strathfield Wednesday 15th September 2010, 6:30- 8pm, to Saturday 2nd October
